phoneHistory.name: MOTOROLA DynaTAC
phoneHistory.Info: It was the first commercial cell phone to be heavy and expensive.

phoneHistory.name: NOKIA 1011
phoneHistory.Info:
The first GSM-enabled mobile phone to use a SIM card.
It was the first mass-produced GSM mobile phone manufactured by Nokia and operated in 14 countries at the time of its launch.

phoneHistory.name: Anycall SCH-A100
phoneHistory.Info: It is the first mobile phone to carry the brand name `Anycall`, which was released in 1994.

phoneHistory.name: Anycall SPH-WP10
phoneHistory.Info:
It is listed in the Guinness Book of World Records as the world's first wristwatch cell phone.
 Unlike modern Galaxy Gear, it was not an auxiliary device but an actual cell phone.

phoneHistory.name: MOTOROLA RAZR
phoneHistory.Info:
It is a product as the beginning of the thin phone.
 It has gained huge popularity worldwide, making Motorola the world's No.1 mobile brand.

phoneHistory.name: Anycall SCH-M220
phoneHistory.Info:
The World's First Mobile Phone with Built-in TV Features.
 Although it has high technology, its sales volume was low at such a high price.

phoneHistory.name: Apple Iphone
phoneHistory.Info:
Steve Jobs' masterpiece of first smartphone form. Iphone from Apple.
 The Most Innovative Product in Cell Phone History.

phoneHistory.name: GALAXY Note
phoneHistory.Info: SAMSUNG's First Smartphone to Use S-Pen. It's meaningful as the first phablet smartphone.

phoneHistory.name: Iphone 5
phoneHistory.Info:
Steve Jobs' first iPhone to be released after death. 
 The first iPhone to break away from Steve Jobs' insistence.

phoneHistory.name: GALAXY Z Fold
phoneHistory.Info: It is a smartphone that newly pioneered the form and genre of foldable smartphones that deviate from classic bar-type smartphones.

phoneHistory.name: LG Velvet 2 Pro
phoneHistory.Info:
This is LG Electronics' last smartphone. 
 It was supposed to be released in the first half of 2021, but it was not released.
